Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which deities bring humans out of a dangerous situation
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= condition of a human or a spirit that is not considered morally good or pure or right; can refer to an individual, a group, or a nation
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds in order to determine a course of action that will achieve a certain purpose
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= process by which humans plan aggression or war against other humans
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking

= long legless reptile without eyelids or external ears; it moves by wriggling or gliding; some species have a poisonous bite; ≈ symbol of lurking, unexpected danger; associated with lies, deception, and misleading teaching

= poisonous fluid; ◄ secreted by serpents, scorpions, etc. and introduced into body of victim by bite or sting; ► used by these animals to kill their prey and/or defend themselves against their natural enemies; ≈ often used to denote suffering and injury in a more general sense as well
exact meaning unsure; possibly: spider or viper
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds in order to determine a course of action that will achieve a certain purpose
= causative action by which someone give another person or object a violent push in a certain direction ► in order to cause that person or object to move away or to fall

literally: footstep, used exclusively in a figurative way to denote part of one's journey through life; hence: = something that is being done and, when God is the agent, something that other people ought to do as well; at the same time one can easily slip and fall, which is a metaphor for failure
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or objects to be invisible so that their location cannot be determined, which is often achieved by burying them or by covering them
= state in which humans have an elevated status in their own eyes, ≈ which is seen as a negative and undesirable attitude for humans
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control

= rope tied into a noose, attached to the other end to a bent bough or small tree that springs upright and tightens the noose around the victim when the trap is sprung; ► used for hunting animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= causative action by which humans spread out an object, such as a piece of cloth, a net, or a document either horizontally or vertically
= net of unknown size and shape; ► used for hunting birds and other animals, and also for fishing; ≈ associated with aggression and control
literally: hand; hence: = pertaining to the location to the left or right of an object ◄ analogous to the location of someone's hands or arms
= relatively narrow road (דֶּרֶךְ) that connects two locations and facilitates travelling; ≈ often extended to denote our journey through life
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else
= to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else; ◄ by approaching that person in a very humble way
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
literally: day of weapons; hence: = time when an armed conflict takes place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state of experiencing a desire to see something happen or do something oneself
= plan or strategy that someone has thought out to accomplish a certain goal
= causative action by which deities cause the plans of humans to succeed

literally: to be, become high; hence: = processs by which humans or deities acquire an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
literally: surrounding; hence: = a group of people that are around someone
literally: to cover; hence: = process by which certain events happen with a great intensity and are often more than the recipient can bear
= process by which objects fall down
= carbonized material resulting from heating wood, ► and used for cooking or warming

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= causative process by which humans cause (other) humans and objects to move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a hole in the ground, usually containing water and maybe mud
= particle marking a proposition as not true
literally: person of tongue; hence: = a human who speaks bad about alleged faults they find with other humans
= particle marking a proposition as not true
literally: to be established; hence: = process by which humans find security and stability

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong

= causative action by which humans or animals make an effort to capture or kill (other) animals, sometimes with the help of devices such as weapons and traps; ► usually with the intention of killing and eating them; ≈ implies using stealth to locate and pursue the quarry, often used metaphorically to refer acts of aggression towards people or events to get other people in one's power
= process by which something happens with more urge and speed than usual
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God
= particle limiting the focus to one phrase and so enhancing its truth value
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= person whose behavior is morally and ethically right
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
